titles.title: Chugach Alaska Land Exchange Oil Spill Recovery Act of 2025
Chugach Alaska Land Exchange Oil Spill Recovery Act of 2025
Chugach Alaska Land Exchange Oil Spill Recovery Act of 2025
To exchange non-Federal land held by the Chugach Alaska Corporation for certain Federal Land in the Chugach Region, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs.
Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-451.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 386.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To
